00261 inline double CDouble::GetRounded(double value, int precision)
00262 {
00263        double scale = qPow(10.0, precision);
00264 
00265        return qFloor(value * scale + 0.5) / scale;
00266 }
00267 
00268 
00269 inline bool CDouble::IsRoundedEqual(double value1, double value2, int precision)
00270 {
00271        double scale = qPow(10.0, precision);
00272 
00273        return qFloor(value1 * scale + 0.5) == qFloor(value2 * scale + 0.5);
00274 }

00285 inline bool CDouble::IsRoundedDownEqual(double value1, double value2, int precision)
00286 {
00287        double scale = qPow(10.0, precision);
00288 
00289        return qFloor(value1 * scale) == qFloor(value2 * scale);
00290 }

00292 
00293 inline double CDouble::GetRoundedUp(double value, int precision)
00294 {
00295        double scale = qPow(10.0, precision);
00296 
00297        return qCeil(value * scale) / scale;
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 inline bool CDouble::IsRoundedUpEqual(double value1, double value2, int precision)
00302 {
00303        double scale = qPow(10.0, precision);
00304 
00305        return qCeil(value1 * scale) == qCeil(value2 * scale);
00306 }

00308 
00309 inline bool CDouble::IsSimiliar(double value1, double value2, double tolerance)
00310 {
00311        return qAbs(value1 - value2) <= tolerance;
00312 }
